dmca.title: Hinduwebsite Claims Bad Karma
dmca.body:
Dear Sir, 

Re: The copyrighted content and text of the year 2005 and prior, which rightfully belongs to http://www.hinduwebsite.com and its owners, has been reproduced without permission and infringed upon by the owners and administrators of http://www.autostok.com. 

1. The Site that has been infringed upon 

I am [Private], the author, owner and administrator of http://www.hinduwebsite.com and http://www.QJMail.com. I have the exclusive copyright to the material that is published on hinduwebsite.com, QJMail.com and my other websites both as an owner and author of the content and the websites. 

I want to bring to your notice that the copyrighted material of the entire website of http://www.hinduwebsite.com, of the year 2005 and prior, when it was a html version website, has been downloaded into another server and renamed as http://www.autostok.com by the owners of http://www.autostok.com with no prior permission or authorization from the owners of http://www.hinduwebsite.com who have the exclusive right to the content. 

All my attempts to trace the owners of autostok.com have failed. The server where autostok.com is hosted is beyond trace. Autostok.com seems to be an illegal website hosted by an unknown server. The administrator of the website is a counterfeit. A sample analysis of the violator
